text:
@realDonaldTrump LIFE OR DEATH. Trumpet chooses death!

1st Term> In 6 months 
2.72 million infected with Covid19 leaving 130,000 dead.

If re-elected for 2nd Term > 4 years
*SHUDDER*

Yup! If TRUMPET wins he will MAKE AMERICA GRIEVE AGAIN.

But yes, listen to his BS & go ahead vote for him
